website_summaries.verdict: High-performance wireless earbuds from a top headphone brand.
pros: Comes with four different eartip options to comfortably fit ears of different sizes
Crisp audio quality for music and calls
Easily portable and enabled to quick-charge
cons: Some reports that the headphones stop working within months

customer_reviews.title: Defective?!?
customer_reviews.text: Will not pair with anything!!! Have tried everything and these won't pair up with Android or apple phone or iPads. I'm kicking myself because I normally read reviews before making a purchase but I didn't on these since I had confidence in beats from past experiences. Not feeling so confident anymore.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent earbuds that lack fit options
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Beatsx that I’ve owned. I loved the first pair but they stopped working after about 18 months of daily use. I ordered a new black pair expecting the same packaging. These head phones don’t come with the wing tips like they used to. Without the wing tips these won’t stay snug in many ear shapes. The sound profile is good and they stay connected well. Don’t expect many options for tailoring the fit to your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew White

customer_reviews.title: poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with the battery life. Dont believe them if they tell you it lasts 8hrs. Not satisfied at all
customer_reviews.author: Shawasty

customer_reviews.title: Do your research before buying
customer_reviews.text: They are great for music but the sound quality for phone calls is not good. People always tell me that the background noise is horrible
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J C

customer_reviews.title: Matte gold
customer_reviews.text: Highly suggest these matte gold color , everything is good about it and the sound quality is super amazing . The color is just beautiful. Battery time is also super great . Charging time even better cause of the 5 min charge gives u 2 hours of play back . highly suggest these matte gold beats x.
customer_reviews.author: Aiden Pearce

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE, Broke in a few months
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were great when they worked. Haven’t had issues until they just stopped working a few days ago after trying to charge them when they ran out of battery. I bought these in April and used them frequently( every other day for a couple hours), have never damaged, stepped on, dropped in water etc. I put them on the charger when they died and the light will flicker. Once you take it off, it doesn’t come back on. Very dissatisfying and disappointed to say the least because when they worked it was fantastic sound quality and the battery life last for hours (4-5) at a time.
customer_reviews.author: musiclover342

customer_reviews.title: NEW VERSION NOT THE SAME
customer_reviews.text: Bought these the month they first came out years ago and they were the best earbuds I ever owned. Years later I lost my pair and had to replace them, these are not the same earbuds. They are missing the various wingtips, the case, and other accessories they used to come with. The wing tips in particular were what made me love these headphones and without them they are insecure and uncomfortable. It was a really nasty disappointing experience to find out they stripped essential features from the product without making any note on the packaging. I highly recommend you look elsewhere until Apple corrects this, or search for an older version.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: BROKE VERY FAST
customer_reviews.text: Bought them on a limb. Now I’ll never use wired headphones again. These are surprisingly easy. LOVE EDIT: broke very very quickly and im now very disappointed that such expensive apple items break so quickly. EDIT 2: went through the hassle of apple repairing them. AND THEY BROKE AGAIN WITHIN A MONTH. AND NOW THEY WONT FIX THEM AGAIN. Well, they will fix them, for a cost higher than buying a completely new pair... warranty policy is crap. @BEATS I WANT A REFUND PLEASE. AND THEN ILL DELETE THIS REVEIW. not that apple/beats cares. But if you're going to see such poorly made unreliable products at least have the decency to offer support when they inevitably break.
customer_reviews.author: Jezza19

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: When paying a premium for such a basic product, you would hope they could at least verify it powers on before boxing. Received a pair that won’t power on. They show fully charged when plugged in but as soon as they are disconnected all lights go off and won’t come on no matter how many times you press the power button or how long you hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn L.

customer_reviews.title: The fast charging is a game changer
customer_reviews.text: My favorite feature is the fast charging. 10 minutes and it's fully charged. - sound quality is pretty good. I mostly use them at work to listen to sports radio or pod cast. - connects very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tyberious

customer_reviews.title: No waterproof or sweat resistant
customer_reviews.text: These are not water proof or sweat resistant at all!!! So be careful, I used it to work out thinking a bit of sweat was ok, it wasn't even that bad, because I had a towel, but the sweat from my face was hitting the piece where you control the volume, and now it's broken, it will go crazy from time to time. Really disappointed considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana G

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working after a Year
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these last year and they suddenly stopped turning on. I reset the headphones as instructed on the support website but nothing worked. I finally called Apple Support and was told either mail the headphones in or bring them into the store. I brought them into Apple and since this was just over a year the warranty had expired. The only option I had was to mail them in for $79 and they would either fix or replace the headphones. Completely ridiculous to pay more than half for a replacement/fix and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: lbe820

customer_reviews.title: Love my Beats
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. The first I had were left behind in another State and never recovered. I couldn't live without them. However, I did buy these for my husband for his birthday and since mine are Gone, I can't live without them...So, he so willingly gave them to me...The only reason why I gave these 4 stars is because I haven't determined whether its my Verizon service, my iphone7, or these earbuds that is giving me a problem with communication. Anyone I talk to on the phone talks over me. I try to begin a sentence, apparently there's a delay because the person on the other end begins to talk. I'm always apologizing or getting extremely annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: CARRIE

customer_reviews.title: Buy the protection plan/insurance offered!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones but they will die eventually. My first pair lasted ~14 months but I took the advice of my husband and bought the $8 protection plan and when they broke and couldn't be repaired = check for $109! Totally worth it. I bought a replacement pair and of course a protection plan for those.
customer_reviews.author: JennyfromBoston

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these BeatsX in spite of all the negative reviews because my friend has one that he says is great. So I was hoping that Apple has fixed the problem in the newer models. Nope - straight out of the box, encountered the no power problem reported in many other reviews. Charging overnight made no difference. The light works (it goes on when plugged in); it's as though the button is broken. Tried a reset by holding down the power and volume buttons, still no work. Tried various other solutions from YouTube and the Internet. Still no go. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good earphones
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and sounds very crisp just not much bass
customer_reviews.author: VikJon Garcia

customer_reviews.title: problem
customer_reviews.text: had to send back, would not stay in my ears
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Decent Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is way too short. Also, there is no answer button which takes away the versatility.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these. They are no longer an reputable brand name.
customer_reviews.text: My first set 2 1/2 years ago was amazing. No issues at all. This 2nd pair wldnt turn on from Day 3. The store wldnt return my emails and ignored Amazon customer service. Amazon then connected me to Apple Cust svc who helped me fix the issue. Since then the buttons work intermittently and now it won’t start, yet again and the reset isn’t helping. Very disappointing. Amazon shld provide a warranty because they are selling subpar products. The knock offs are rampant although they are still selling at normal prices. I paid $109 for knock offs. Amazon needs to screen for China knock offs being sold by third parties.
customer_reviews.author: Kate999

customer_reviews.title: Good but Died on Me
customer_reviews.text: These were decent. I like how they would hang around my neck and the magnetic part would help keep me from losing them. I rated these 2 stars because after having them for a little over 6 months they stopped charging. I tried resetting them and everything many times and they just keep flashing white. They were quite expensive for not working as long as they did. The only part I liked the most about them was that the mic seemed to work well. My boyfriend is in the UK so I would use them all the time to talk to him while doing various activities. Good wireless headphones, just didn’t last very long. :(
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They connect easily and the battery is long enough for my liking. Most important of all is the piece that hands around your neck. It doesn’t hit or press on your neck, but it does keep them around your neck. Previously, I had a different pair of Beats (over the ear kind) fall off of me onto the grass in my backyard. Then it rained...and they’re ruined because I never even knew where and when they had fallen off.
customer_reviews.author: N S

customer_reviews.title: 2 units didn't work upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these from Amazon, and neither one worked upon arrival. The power light would not light up unless it was getting charged. The instructions were useless, with 3 steps like, "Power on, pair and go!" So my wife and I hit the forums and tried all the solutions. My wife also bought it to a friend whose BeatsX "just worked," and the friend could not get them working, either. So we returned one pair and received the second pair, and that was the same story. If you search the forums, you'll see lots of issues.
customer_reviews.author: jtherkel

customer_reviews.title: OK for listening
customer_reviews.text: If you're after a basic wireless set of earbuds these are OK. The battery life is not great but not horrible, the included ear tips are somewhat comfortable, but can be improved upon with third party ear tips. Where these things fall on their face is in the two way communication department. As a wireless headset they are totally sucktastic. Totally. Everyone I tried to talk to using these as a headset said they could barely hear me. Everyone. I can't comment on the durability, I stopped using them once I figured out how bad they suck as a headset.
customer_reviews.author: Dick Danger

customer_reviews.title: 0 for 2 On Powering On
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones as a Christmas gift and to much disappointment the first pair were bad. They would not power on. Amazon sent out a replacement pair right away but upon receipt of the second pair they would not work either. Simply no response from the power button, the reset function provided no results, and they would not connect to any device in my Mac universe. I seem to be just incredibly unlucky but it’s also incredibly frustrating and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after 3 mo. Wish I could give it minus 1 stars😔
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped working exactly after 3 months all of a sudden. When I called amazon to fix the issue they redirected me to Apple customer support. Apple customer support said warranty on my item was expired. Apparently amazon has purchased from Apple and kept in Amazon warehouse for many years before I bought the item. Now after a lot of fighting Apple sent me a replacement one. The new replaced headphones also stopped working after 3 months exactly!! Then I called them again and got another replacement ( a lot of fighting and waiting on the line ) even the third replacement item also stopped working now after 3 months!! Wish I could give this 0 or -1 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Hulikere

customer_reviews.title: Just get them, and thank me later.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I use a set for traveling ( I fly at least once a month.) and I enjoyed these headphones so much I got a set to use exclusively at home. Fast charging, great for talking, perfect fit for my ears with the included earbuds. Easy on airplane noise, and I don’t usually have to take them off for the TSA.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny LeJeune

customer_reviews.title: 🚫DON’T  DO IT🚫
customer_reviews.text: 🚫🚫🚫DON’T DO IT🚫🚫🚫 1. Used to be my favorite. Bought them 4 times 🤦🏽‍♀️ 2. 1st pair held good for a year. 3. 2nd pair 1 side broke/no sound didn’t hold the charge long. 4. 3rd pair stopped working within 3 months & didn’t hold charge long. 5. 4th pair (these) Charged but, never powered on. New out of the box. Tried all recommendations, fixes etc. Seriously, nothing you purchase should take this much work. Really upset because when they were good they were so good. 6. DON’T BUY THESE ~Save your money I need a good replacement comparable (still looking)😔if you happen to find something like these please let me know!
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Fusion Beats are better!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 4/9/2019 I don’t know what happened to this set of BEATS? All the other BEATS, have a better battery life. Now after the big accusation from The Doc. and Joe, BEATS, now don’t come with a case. The battery life sucks, and I’ll probably never purchase another pair of Beats. In fact the Fusion Beats sound better and cost about half the price. 5/10/2019, BREAKING NEWS!!! I gave the Beats away, not worth keeping. Buyers beware!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Pressley

customer_reviews.title: Battery depletes very rapidly
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought a set of these earphones, and two years later they are still going strong. So I decided to buy a set for myself. When they arrived, I charged them overnight, but they wouldn’t turn on even though the light indicated that they were fully charged. I sent them back and received a replacement set and these worked. EXCEPT that the battery is depleted after about 45 minutes. They claim the battery lasts 8 hours, but that is rubbish. I am very disappointed. Something happened to the quality during the last two years. I don’t recommend you buy this product. You’ll very likely be wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: ReaderDean

customer_reviews.title: 3-Star: Good sound, 18 month battery life is insufficient for price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought in Jan. 2019 and as of July 2020 the battery is lasting about 30 mins. i play music or stream radio when I use them. At the time of purchase manufacturer advertised 8 hrs of battery life. I did experience that for the first 13 months. However, since then battery life decreased exponentially. As far as sound I like the balanced bass/treble, especially on airplanes for they are more than adequate in noise canceling. I prefer the in-ear bud-style as opposed to the headphone style. Also, i like that these don't fall out during my runs. Regardless, $100+ for 18 months of use is entirely unacceptable. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: W.A.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life varies, not much bass....
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set. The first set is amazing (Blue), and sounds awesome. This set (satin silver) there is a slight difference in sound (not as much bass), but same clarity. Not sure why there is a difference in the bass. And over time charge and recharge, the amount of use time drops in between charges. Not happy about that. I use the (blue) pair at work and the other pair the wife uses at her work. Both charged same time, use same amount of time at work and here's dies before mine.
customer_reviews.author: Greg & Kristen

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed, Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Received a second pair after the first wouldn’t turn on and had the same issue with the second. Did some troubleshooting myself, Contacted Apple support, went through troubleshooting with the agent, Installed software update, charged for more than the recommended amount of time, changed chargers, but you’re both still would not turn on. Returning the second pair and purchasing elsewhere instead of Amazon. Although the exchange/return service is easy, I’m still Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Jilliffer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!!
customer_reviews.text: I waited for a long time to find a pair of headphones that I really liked. I was tired of the cheap headphones and ones with cords. I didn’t want a cheap pair of Bluetooth headphones that would break or the speaker would blow in a matter of weeks. These are amazing! I use them daily and for long periods of time. The regular iPhone headphones and ear buds hurt my ears and I can only wear them for so long. These don’t hurt my ears and they are great! I can set my iPhone down and walk around the house listening to music and not the kids being loud. Definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Harrelson

customer_reviews.title: Once good. Now they’re junk.
customer_reviews.text: My beatsx purchased in 2018 work perfectly. Never any issues. Bought these for my husband for Christmas and returned the first set because the battery life only lasted 20 minutes and a loud screeching noise would appear around 20% battery. The replacement pair simply won’t turn on. They are fully charged (had them plugged in for a couple hours) and the light will not turn on when you press the on button. Now I have to send these back and figure out what to do because I won’t be giving them another chance. Apparently at one point in time they got it right but now it’s all junk. Thanks for ruining a Christmas present, beats.
customer_reviews.author: HSell14

customer_reviews.title: Won’t turn on!! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in black for my fiancé for his birthday because he really liked the pair I had. Right before these came in the mail, mine stopped working. And right out of the box these new ones wouldn’t turn on. So we tried charging them for quite some time and still nothing. We also tried to “reboot” them from what the internet said and NOTHING. We’re so disappointed and I feel so bad because he was so excited for these. I usually read reviews first before buying anything and of course this is the one time I didn’t. And I also never leave reviews on anything. Will be returning to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brand new beatsX that do not work.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to say the least to receive my new beatsX after waiting so long for them to get to me overseas but what a disappointment. They will not even turn on. I charged them for hours, followed all instruction from the manual and even trouble shooted my problem on youtube but to no prevail. After all that they still will not turn on so now I am just stuck with $85.00 earbuds that I can't do anything with. I can't even return them because I am deployed overseas. I would absolutely recommend that you look at other wireless earbuds to spend your money on.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: AVOID AT ALL COSTS! They used to be great, now they’re just garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a pair off Amazon and would they never power on (even after charging overnight). Okay, just bad luck I guess... So I exchanged them straight away. 2nd pair arrived a day later — same thing. Beyond frustrating. I had a pair of them when they first came out (before they were bought by Apple) and they worked great. I lost them, got another pair a couple years later and they lasted 4 months. I’m not sure what Apple did to them, but ever since they have never been the same. Just Google “My BeatsX won’t power on” and you’ll see hundreds of posts of people saying the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Price

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these but there too many things that lacked in quality for me: 1. uncomfortable - even with the various tips they always left my ears hurting after. 2. battery life - no where near what was advertised 3. sound - for beats I thought it would be better, seemed to pretty average to me 4. wished they were lighter weight, or cord was shorter. i did however love the lightning charging port - super convenient since i have an iphone bluetooth connectivity was easy
customer_reviews.author: C. Morales

customer_reviews.title: This makes two units that just stop working..
customer_reviews.text: The product worked really well for a couple months and then failed entirely. Apple support had me send documentation showing that it failed within the warranty.. I did that and am now getting the runaround. One of the photos of the serial number that I sent couldn't be read by Apple because they said the format was a.PNG despite it being an Apple file extension! I converted the scans and photos to JPEG and use their file uploading portal. Now I'm getting no response from Apple. This is the second pair that failed out of the blue so I'm not very happy About making these phone calls. They are not an easy company to get a hold of
customer_reviews.author: GML

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for a workout
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely live these headphone. These are my second set. My old ones were two years old and came with a small rubber case. I feel that folding these small enough to fit in the small rubber case eventually damaged them. These are the same model but 2 years newer and if no longer comes with that small case. Perhaps Beats/Apple saw the potential for damage in that case and that’s why it is no longer included. These are not water proof, but they are water resistant making them perfect when working out and I suggest purchasing a protective case for storage.
customer_reviews.author: EWesley

customer_reviews.title: Durability is questionable
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds worked great for several months and then wouldn't hold a charge most of the time. In addition, the power button became unreliable to the point where I couldn't turn them off even when they held the charge long enough for a workout. I used these primarily at the gym and, therefore, were subject to a lot of sweat and barbells hitting the cord, so that may have had an influence. I found them okay for phone calls, as long as I stayed in one place and didn't move much. I would not recommend them nor will I be purchasing a replacement set of the same kind
customer_reviews.author: B. Welshans

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life - heavy cord
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed- I wanted to like these. They strap is heavy and cumbersome so they aren’t that comfortable to wear. But my biggest complaint is the battery life. It says 8 hours but is more about 6. I actually got a cheaper back up pair because halfway through the day, they’d die. I purchased Boltune Bluetooth 5.0 also from Amazon and they ended up being lighter, more comfortable, great sound and they last 16+ hours, so I’ve actually stopped using the Beats all together. Wish I had saved my money.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke’s Review

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality product
customer_reviews.text: HI All, Save yourself a lot of trouble and don't buy a BeatsX. The sound quality, comfort, and battery all work well. However, I have owned 2 and both of them quit working within the first 3 months. Apple was good about replacing the first set and I have not tried with the latest one which did not last 2 months. I was very careful with the charging and still it gets to a point where it says it charged but won't turn on. Resets et al do not work to restore it. Buyer beware.....
customer_reviews.author: Stright Scoop

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Hard Pass
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a pair and now that I have them, I'm not impressed. The sound quality isn't that great at all which totally surprised me. I actually like my Anker earbuds that cost $25. I like these for the quick charge. I also am having issues getting the right ear size. Wire is long and can become a pain. I should have paid $100 more and gotten the Powerbeats Pro. I'll return these and probably get them. Oh!! It does disconnect from Bluetooth on its own which is annoying and worth the return alone. I'm using a Note 8 with these.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and tinny -
customer_reviews.text: I just received these two days ago - i was looking for something to replace my 5th pair of airpods - i keep losing one of the pairs.... I though these would be handy as they hang around the neck and I wouldn't lose them. I like that they charge with iphone chargers and that is about it. They are very uncomfortable in the ear, and they sound tinny to me. when I get home tonight, i am going to look for the packaging and I am going to return them for something cheaper but better.
customer_reviews.author: Vedana Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 4 months...☹️
customer_reviews.text: These worked fine for a few months...sound quality was ok...nothing great and no where near as good as my Polk set (that I ran through the wash and were way too expensive to replace...)Battery seemed to drain quickly. Anyway....they stopped working completely after about 4 months...amazon won’t return. Will try to return them at the Apple store...will update this review if they replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Kw2013

customer_reviews.title: Poor connection
customer_reviews.text: It cannot connect with my macbook pro, lack of wingtips make them uncomfortable and easy to loosen. I rather pay couples dollars more to get the full package with case and wingtips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t listen to reviews
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived dead. So I thought it was the battery probably needing to be charged. After an hour and still no charge, I decided to check the production date, it was 2018. No way this crappy battery would survive two years in a warehouse. Never again will I purchase Apple products from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: franck amillion

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and blocks out noise when using it with my phone
customer_reviews.text: I like that they really do block out noise and I can hear much better when talking on phone. I’m not sure they hold charge long. My last Bluetooth stay charged like 11 hrs this one said 8 hrs but it’s much shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie J.Mays

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the color & freedom oh & security of wearing these ear buds 🎧. Problem I cannot keep them in my ears. Even had the same trouble with AirPods however I would choose these over AirPods because they hang conveniently around my neck when they are not in use and I have a smaller chance of losing these. With AirPods, you lose one piece & u will shell out $69/piece to replace it. I wear my beats around my collar all day. All comparisons aside, I love the freedom from wired and tethering to my phone. Cleaning my home talking on the phone are easier with these.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound when you select the correct size ear buds
customer_reviews.text: These have excellent sound quality but you have to make sure that you have selected the correct fitting earbuds. I thought the sound was great and then I lost one of the plastic ear things and replaced it with one of the larger ones and found that the sound was much better in that ear! I swapped the other one out and now the sound is amazing! I use them all day for phone and music so I do have to recharge them quite often, so battery life can be an issue. They recharge quickly and I use them a lot, so, no big deal really.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Swain

customer_reviews.title: Great when they work... On 3rd pair in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: These are great when they work. First set I ordered wouldn’t pair. Apple support made me go through a factory reset on my phone! before grudgingly admitting it could be the headphones. Returned for replacement. 2nd pair worked for 2 months then wouldn’t power off. AppleCare transferred me to the Beats Support department, in Australia! Crossing my fingers for 3rd pair. Make sure you have a backup pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Red / White flashing light issue
customer_reviews.text: I really like my power beats. The only issue I’ve had is that when I got them out of the box and tried to charge for the first time the lights were flashing red and white. It indicates that my battery wasn’t charged. Through internet research I found out how to fix that issue and hopefully they will charge so I can use them. They fit nicely and it’s nice not to have anything over the ear. They are lightweight and stay in the ear upon movement
customer_reviews.author: Trace

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy them
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time with these headphones. I got my first set and was having difficulty even getting them to turn on. I am a support technician so I know how to troubleshoot effectively. I ended up returning them and replacing with the same thing. I received the second set and the SAME thing happened. When plugged into the computer, it shows they’re 100% charged. Won’t turn on. I won’t be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Beats Suck
customer_reviews.text: I got this in April of this year. I went to use it and it was dead. I plugged it in and after a few hours still would not charge. Changed charger to see if it was the charger and no luck. I left it on the charger over night to see and still no luck. Very disappointed. Never was impressed with Beats. I’m a Bose person but wanted to give it a shot. Well first and last time I will buy any Beats product. Got this only a few months and now it’s too late to return. This sucks specially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: A gift that was ruin
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product no stars I would I bought these beat X as a gift and they did not work literally no lights, no power. No one is home. Thank you for ruining my surprise. I repeat I will buy this POS again. Btw I am in I.T. support I should not have to fix a product. My trust is gone. The only reason you got one star is because the Amazon delivery person dropped off the package.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great but not durable - Second I bought but never again
customer_reviews.text: This is the second wireless earphone I bought.its amazing. Easy to handle and to fit in-ears. Good talking and standby time. When I bought the first time, the battery went crazy after a few months. I didn't have any warranty. I thought that was my bad luck to get a defect. I bought another one but same problem. Power won't come on. Updated the firmware, as some people online suggested trying: Nothing. Charged again: Nothing. Did a "reset" holding down power and volume button: Nothing. There are dozens, if not hundreds, of people online dealing with the same thing. Not sure what to do now.
customer_reviews.author: LeJugle

customer_reviews.title: Great sound as expected from beats
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of these, one for myself and one as a gift to my brother. We're both very satisfied with the earphones. Quality is really great, full sounding. Clear sound as well as good base. I have a galaxy S8 & the earphones have no issues connecting via bluetooth. Battery life is roughly about 8 hrs, as described and charging time is very quick too. Overall great product ideal for daily use. Occasionally used for workout too and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: luitarou

customer_reviews.title: If you want a set of headphones that sounds good for less than 2 hours, look no further.
customer_reviews.text: The add said up to 8 hours of listening time. I never got more than 2 hours. And that was with the volume not over 1/2. I am returning them now. Looking for a set that will last much longer. READ THE REVIEWS ON THIS PRODUCT CAREFULLY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonmax1114

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable durable good sound
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pair for 3 years and I love them. I bought the newer version for my husband for his bday and he uses them all the time. And he’s a technical kind of man and loves his “toys” lol so these were perfect for everyday use. Connects easily to all his Apple devices. He’s also a teacher and uses them for online classes. He never has any issues. Battery life is perfect and charges fast!!! Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: They do not last
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair. the first pair lasted about 6 months before one of the earphones went out. This was replaced under warranty, but one of the earphones went out on those as well right after the warranty expired. I purchased a new pair and one of the earpieces stopped working again right after the warranty expired. So 3 pair and all stopped working. I will not be replacing again.
customer_reviews.author: sshields

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Sound is only OK, but they don't last very long. This was my second and last, and both lasted less than 6 months. Tried to obtain warranty service, but Apple was unable to "verify" The Purchase date even with the correct serial number. So, skip this trouble if you can. The sound is only OK anyway, and the battery does not last "All Day" Only nice thing is bluetooth and even that will just disconnect sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Won't even turn on
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair of these as a present. I charged them, and they wouldn't even turn on. Tried resetting them, still nothing. I returned them, got a new pair, exact same problem. Used Apple online support, figured maybe I was doing something wrong (although, c'mon, all I had to do was push the power button...). They suggested returning them. Do your online research and you'll see...LOTS of complaints about these, especially power issues. They are an inferior product, not worth the money...stay away! Complete junk.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Donovan

customer_reviews.title: They don't last, we've had 4 they always break 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Use these 50% for talking on the phone, and they work great - comfortable, good mic, good sound. Easy Bluetooth connection, and great battery life. Problem is my girlfriend and I both have had two sets each, and all 4 lasted exactly 5 months each time. I am very careful with mine, I have a place to hang them when not on my neck, so even taking good care of them they always end up losing one ear. They just break. Customer support is via Apple and is... Not my favorite thing. Buyer beware, seriously not worth the price not even close.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan S.

customer_reviews.title: Don buy
customer_reviews.text: Let me sane I have owned a pair of beats X wireless headphones before and they were great. I decided to buy a new pair. They wouldn’t charge or even turn on. I had that pair returned and were sent a new one as promised. But again it would only charge and wouldn’t turn on. Very unsatisfied with his product. I did some research and was shown that majority the ones that are returned. Are fixed and resold so you’re not actually getting new headphones. Which in this case I’m thinking I received two used headphones which is not what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: the wingtips are gone
customer_reviews.text: Just got my latest BeatsX. These are IMO still the best all-day headphones out there*. The ability to have the earbud(s) partially in your ear to allow ambient sounds while navigating city streets with a podcast on, OR push them all the way in for a sealed and high-fidelity music session is (was) the 2nd greatest thing about these (1st being the can't-lose-em around-the-neck design). *However. They have stopped including the wingtip earbud attachments. And the 3rd party knockoff options are apparently all too flimsy. This is a huge disappointment which makes these far less appealing. The partial-insertion/podcast mode I described is almost destroyed by this ridiculous change to the product. BOOOO.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J Wingstrom

customer_reviews.title: Second pair to not work, would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Never worked and wa s the second pair we ordered and now have returned. Not sure what’s going on but both sets never even charged or worked right out the box. Ordered a pair from Best Buy and worked just fine
customer_reviews.author: Keri G

customer_reviews.title: Ear phones are NOT well balanced for hearing. Left ear is too low as compared to the right.
customer_reviews.text: I like that they use same power cord as my iphone. I have unsuccessfully tried various foam tips to get them to stay in my ears even ones that didn’t come with the earphones. BIGGEST COMPLAINT is the left ear phone is pretty much useless. IF it came with an “balance” feature so you could adjust the earphones equally it would improve the earphones immensely. Always feel like I have just one ear phone because the variation is immense. I Would NOT buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lynn Crist

customer_reviews.title: Great Earphones
customer_reviews.text: Great! I’ve had Bose (wired and Bluetooth) earphones for years, but these Beats are better. Sound quality and power is great. The only “but” is that I’ve found battery life is good , but not as promised. The 5 minute charge however works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Prado

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Buying this was like setting $100+ on fire. It worked okay for 6 months - battery life was short (need to charge daily after a couple hours of use), never fit my ears well so audio quality was weak. One day they started flashing red. I tried to reset per manufacturer instructions, but the headset was dead. I feel bad that I burned $100 to fill a landfill with this junk.
customer_reviews.author: picks

customer_reviews.title: Good, until they suddenly stop working.
customer_reviews.text: Well, after my first pair mysteriously died after a year I replaced them with another of the same hoping that they would be okay. They are not. I’ve had this pair about a year, and they too just suddenly died. I googled the problem and found that many people have the exact same issue. It’s just a defective product. Too bad because sound quality is good and I like the simple design. But these are absolutely not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Treble for hearing impairment
customer_reviews.text: Treble for hearing on the phone, these are the best i have found but the battery life really sucks. With more work being on the phone with Covid I ended up buying two more sets. One set just stop working, it wouldn't take a charge anymore, so I ended up buying two more for a total of 4 to cycle through during the day and having an extra pair in the office and in the car charging. I am hearing impaired from the military and these have been phenomenal with more limited bass and high quality treble for use with the cell phone or iPad.
customer_reviews.author: CS Pence

customer_reviews.title: 2 bad beats.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair I have got. Both have been defective. Wont turn on after you charge them. So now I have to return them and wait for another replacement pair. For my trouble Amazon give me a 5 dollar gift card. Been dealing with this for about a month. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: sam wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fine but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 pairs of these with about 3-4 replacements. They work well when they are functioning. Some common problems are dead battery, broken on one side, and dead battery again. I have so many troubles with the batteries. The earplugs will sit tightly in your ears no matter which size you are using. If you don't like that something is completely blocking your ear, don't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Khang

customer_reviews.title: These are the best headphones ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones ever! The sound quality is amazing! The only thing I would change would be if the headphones vibrated or something to let me know a call was coming in. I have an IPhone 7 Plus and when I have the headphones connected the ring tone only comes through the headphones so I don’t have one of them in my ear I do not hear it ringing. Besides that, these are hands down the best headphones I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Audrianna Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I need a refund!!
customer_reviews.text: There is a missing part from the packaging. I’m so disappointed. The photo is what I have recieved and its completely different from what I have seen on other people’s photo/video. Why so?
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Prak

customer_reviews.title: They don’t last very long
customer_reviews.text: The earphones were amazing, until they stopped working. I bought 2 pair, one for myself and one for my daughter and just a little over a year hers have completely stopped working and one ear is blown on mine. For the price I paid for them I would expect them to actually work longer than a year and a half. I was told by Beats that due to being out of warranty I would have to pay almost the price I paid for them to have them serviced. For that price I’ll go and buy a pair of earphones that I won’t have to replace every year. I’m highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Monica Silva

customer_reviews.title: Matte Gold = Rose Gold!!!
customer_reviews.text: This review is based solely on the color. I previously owned the blue version, had to replace them, and loved the sound and functionality of them. The matte gold is marketed as "gold" but in reality it's very tan and pinkish, way more of a rose gold (should be marketed that way). It's not at all a good color for a dude like me so going to return and order the silver ones instead. They should seriously reconsidering marketing these as rose gold instead of gold so that customers know what they are buying.
customer_reviews.author: Ebert

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Purchase these March 31, 2018. They died today september 7, 2018. I did not even use them on a daily basis. Seems like the same problem a lot of people have been posting about. Did all of the resetting recommendations that have been posted online and nothing is working. I can't even return them because the return time has passed. $100 down the drain. I would not recommend buying these.
customer_reviews.author: pattalley

customer_reviews.title: Defective and won’t turn on and out of warranty
customer_reviews.text: poorly made, it will not turn on after full charge and I had to return it. It is a very common issue for this model, manufacture defect. I also updated the firmware and contact manufacture, they told me this is also out of warranty date of production 8/2018. Amazon really need to step up to it’s game and check they are getting the products from realizable sources.
customer_reviews.author: Amz Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hate the color - seriously why nonwhite?
customer_reviews.text: I LOST my original pair on a walk and I idea how that can happen. No one returned them so I was forced to buy me ones. Obviously not an essential item but I like them for walking or when biking/roller blading because they work with a helmet. I was unhappy that they are not white. My original ones where. These just seem like they are dirty
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Please do not buy this product EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst product of all times, it worked once before it stopped working. The turning on switch wouldn’t turn in the beats earphones. Trying my best to return the product back to Amazon but having such a hard time getting the return label to return the hardly used yet non functional product back to the seller. All I need now is to get rid of this and get my money back and never recommend or buy this product EVER again !
customer_reviews.author: Sathya R.

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this same pair 3 times as I love the fit and feel compared to other brands similar. The reason I've owned 3 is they all have broken on me including this pair. 2 of the 3 pairs of these Dre Beats has left ear failure and another pair just would not charge. I feel that the overall quality of these are poor for performance as they continue to break.
customer_reviews.author: Joe becker

customer_reviews.title: Double DOA
customer_reviews.text: Just like many similar reviews, the headphones were dated 2018 and dead on arrival. Wouldn’t turn on, plugging in to charge flashed red & white and then immediately solid white to indicate charging done. After exchanging defective order for another, it too was dated 2018 and DOA. After giving up on Amazon, a pair ordered from Apple dated 2019 had similar symptoms but actually started charging and worked after that.
customer_reviews.author: cyl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome earphones
customer_reviews.text: Awesome earphones. Comes with extra pieces that help it stay in your ear while doing more intense workouts. I use them everyday and haven’t had any problems yet. They also connect to my iPhone instantly
customer_reviews.author: allen hollander

customer_reviews.title: Pop ups make it unusable.
customer_reviews.text: It repeatedly pops up to tell me it's connected, interfering with my iPhone use. I've updated the firmware twice, but it won't stop. It actually got in way of going through TSA at the airport. I used to love the Beatsx (I've owned four of them), but now I've thrown it out and am purchasing a competitor's model. I won't even buy a Beatsx again. It's not worth the problems it causes. Good hardware, but terrible software: overall, no longer usable.
customer_reviews.author: Future

customer_reviews.title: A Gift that hit the mark
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very pleased with these headphones. Sound is good, comfortable fit and he liked the subtle color of the silver.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Koza

customer_reviews.title: Poor Battery Performance
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of Beats. Think I bought the first pair from Apple. At any rate they have good range and long battery life. As the battery life began to diminish with my first pair I bought this second pair. The battery life on the new pair is at a maximum only 3 hours after a full overnight charge. Very disappointing. So now I listen with my old ones for a few hours and then switch to these, etc. I have visual impairment, so I listen to books all the time and this is so frustrating. I have since returned thevearphones.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Halverson

customer_reviews.title: Less than a year later... broken
customer_reviews.text: For the money and hassle I would say just skip these and go for another brand and/or style. They lasted less than a year and the quality of sound wasn't that great.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: No Pouch or Storage Case
customer_reviews.text: I left my beats earbuds (grey color) on a plane last month and ordered a new pair straight away once I returned home. The grey color wasn't available anymore so opted for the matte silver. I've just unwrapped the package and I'm a little confused because mine didn't come with a pouch! I can see that other people received storage cases/pouches with theirs. I'm thinking of returning them because for $100, I need to protect them as I travel with them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Clements

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I loved them until one side randomly stopped working half way through a workout after only having them for a month
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Broomhead

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable battery life
customer_reviews.text: This product has a nice feeling very sleek designHowever. However it's Major flaw is it's Major flaw is is "up to eight hours" battery life. But usually for me more like six hours.. Also thankfully I bought a product warranty as I have lost sound in one earphone within the first within the first four months. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: janice M

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 5 months 🥺
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this earphones , and they were great for 5-6 months . However after that time frame , they broke , and by this I mean that they played music for about 2 minutes , then turned off and it took me almost 10-15 minutes for them to turn back on. The white light blinked 3 times , I’ve followed every single help guideline I could find and nothing worked . I’m very disappointed, but I’ve leaned my lesson. I will never get these again.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Could never get them to turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a gift for my daughter. She opened them on her birthday ( 2 weeks after they arrived) and could never get them to work. She brought them to me when she was visiting from out of state. I found out that there was only a short window to return the item and I was one week too late. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy H

customer_reviews.title: YOU MAY BE LUCKY—I WASN’T!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of BeatsX by Dr. Dre. Bought my first pair at Best Buy and had them for a couple of years. I love them. However bought a pair through Amazon and it doesn’t work. Jumped on YouTube, and there are suggestions on how to pair, that it’s a manufacturing problem and I watched some people repair by soldering battery connections and stuff. Bottom line, like any new product it should work. I’ve tried for a week trying to get them to work. Not good at taking it apart to fix but Did you eat? To the overwhelming reviews of customers who are having problems, I highly recommend that you bypass purchasing this product.😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but fragile
customer_reviews.text: These are super convenient and work well, BUT... They are fragile and you must baby them. I'm on my third set by now. They are so exactly what I want I am willing to pay for a 9 month lifespan device. You may not be. Be gentle with them (I'm really trying to on this pair now) or that will be about how long they last before an internal connection fails. An extended warranty might be worth the price also.
customer_reviews.author: GREG S

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones, but they broke 10 months in.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are my fav, but I was super disappointed when they broke about ten months after I purchased them. I did learn that they have a one year warranty, so they are able to be replaced through Beats if they break before that. Other than the breaking, I've been super happy with this simple headphone.
customer_reviews.author: CMurphyG

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new beats x! I debated if I wanted these or the airpods, and I'm so glad that I decided on the beats. I don't have to worry about them falling from around my neck because the magnet in each earbud keeps them together when not in my ear. The sound quality is great, but I hate that it picks up wind so well during my conversations, but it's a small price to pay for walking outside I suppose. Other than that the instant pairing with my iPhone is great, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Headphones did not power on.
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair they were working great One day they stop turning on So I just order a new pair Brand new pair does not want to turn on Extremely disappointed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: minion

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, prefer to have more color options, because the black ones blend in with my truck interior, and the “silver” ones are actually white, which I don’t like. Overall, great sound quality, great battery life. I would like to see them add an external speaker as another option. I use these to listen to the radio while I am working, and sometimes I need to hear what is going on around me. Overall, would recommend them to anyone looking for some great sound via Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie Linginfelter

product_meta.title: BeatsX Wireless Earphones - Apple W1 Headphone Chip, Class 1 Bluetooth, 8 Hours Of Listening Time - Black
feature_bullets: Compatible with iOS and Android devices
Up to 8 hours of battery life for when you’re on the go
With Fast Fuel, a 5-minute charge gives you 2 hours of playback when battery is low
Flex-Form cable provides all-day comfort with easy purse and pocket portability
Take calls, control your music, and activate Siri with the RemoteTalk cable
What’s in the Box: BeatsX earphones, eartips with four size options, Lightning to USB-A charging cable, quick start guide, warranty card
